# cli
11111010

# xor ax, ax
00110001 11000000

# mov ds, ax
10001110 11011000

# mov es, ax
10001110 11000000

# mov ss, ax
10001110 11010000

# mov ax, 0x7E00
10111000 00000000 01111110

# mov sp, ax
10001001 11000100

# mov bp, ax
10001001 11000101

# sti
11111011

# cld
11111100

# mov ah, 0x0E
10110100 00001110

# mov al, 'H'
10110000 01001000

# int 0x10
11001101 00010000

# mov al, 'i'
10110000 01101001

# int 0x10
11001101 00010000

# cli
11111010

# hlt
11110100

# jmp 0x12
11101011 11111100
